title: Ticket #673: TmpDir class improvements
description:
* Don't do anything if the path passed in is "" or ".". * Assert or except if the chdir() back to the original directory fails. * Maybe use fchir to avoid having to use getcwd(). (Probably can't do this on Windows.)

Having this optimization would have make working around LIGO's problem from condro-admin #19609 easier.
remarks:
2009-08-19: did everything listed above except for using fchdir(). I'm planning to wait to do that until after 7.3.2 (wenger).
